p.k: When the Rust Bucket runs out of gas on a foggy East Coast road Ben Gwen and Max are forced to stay at hotel being menaced by Creepy Carl. / Ben is attacked by Dr. Animo mutants. When they realize the faux mini-golf village they are at isnâ€™t an actual town, Ben must stop them before they see the real city down the road. / Ben, Gwen and Max make a return to Max's alma-mater but this time it's no homecoming. / When Max drags the kids to see a defunct House of the Future built by his childhood idol Ben discovers Steam Smythe is busy searching for a powerful and devastating device. / Ben is at the annual Big Bacon Pig Parade but childhood friend Penny Heaven has met the family to ruin Ben's fun with her safety-obsessed self.
